import Minus from "../../SVGs/Minus"; import Plus from "../../SVGs/Plus"; import Basket from "../../SVGs/Basket"; function Home({ Data, DataUser, Index, Order, setOrder }) { return ( <>

{DataUser[0].name}

{Data[Index].title}

{Data[Index].description}

setOrder(Order - 1)}>

${Data[Index].price * Order}

{Order} order

setOrder(Order + 1)}>

Get the second order in half price

); } export default Home;
